snippet: How a cabdriver and a police detective in Brooklyn joined forces to return a lost laptop to an Upper West Side resident.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column tells story of how, thanks to honest taxi driver, diligent police detective and city's 311 help line, Manhattan man was able to recover laptop he left in trunk of cab.
lead_paragraph: How a cabdriver and a police detective in Brooklyn joined forces to return a lost laptop to an Upper West Side resident.

headline.print_headline: New York Is Sometimes a Faithful Place
headline.main: New York Is Sometimes a Faithful Place
